questions.question: Which of the following is wrong?

options.code:
-- ftd.text: Hello
color: red

-- ftd.text:
text: Hello
color: red

-- ftd.text:
value: Hello
color: red

-- ftd.text:
color: red

Hello

questions.question: How to create a record `person` where
questions.more-detail:
- employee-id of type integer is taken in caption
- name of type string
- bio of type string is taken in body and is optional?

options.code:
-- record person:
caption integer employee-id:
string name:
body bio:

-- record person:
caption integer employee-id:
string name:
optional body bio:

-- record person:
integer caption employee-id:
string name:
optional body bio:

-- record person:
employee-id: integer caption
name: string 
bio: optional body

questions.question: Which is/are INVALID options for defining record variable `d` of type random-data?
questions.code:
-- string s1: abc

-- record random-data:
caption title:
body description:
optional string sub-title:

options.code:
-- random-data d: Title
sub-title: This is some text

This is some more text

-- random-data d: $s1 
title: This is some text

This is some more text

-- random-data d: 
title: This is some text

This is some more text

-- random-data d: 1
sub-title: Numbers
description: This is number 1

questions.question: Where do we store the package name?
Which of them are called container components?
Which `ftd` file is rendered on the `/` URL path?
Which of them CANNOT be accessed using assets?
What happens when user clicks on `Click me` cta?
questions.code:
-- integer $value: 50

-- ftd.text: Click me
$on-click$: $ftd.increment-by($a = $value, v = 10)
width.fixed.px: *$value

-- ftd.integer: $value

-- ftd.integer: *$value

options.value:
- Component ftd.text's width will change to 60.
- First component ftd.integer's value will change to 60.
- Second component ftd.integer's value will change to 60.

- Component ftd.text's width will not change.
- First component ftd.integer's value will change to 60.
- Second component ftd.integer's value will not change.

- Component ftd.text's width will change to 60.
- First component ftd.integer's value will not change.
- Second component ftd.integer's value will change to 60.

questions.question: Which of the following is/are NOT a primitive type?
Which of the lines in this code-snippet is/are INCORRECT?
questions.code:
-- component foo:  ;; Line 1
caption name: ;; Line 2 
private boolean mouse-hovered: false  ;; Line 3

-- ftd.integer: $foo.name   ;; Line 4
color: red  ;; Line 5
color if { foo.mouse-hovered }: #12ff46ad  ;; Line 6
$on-mouse-enter$: $ftd.set-bool($a = $foo.mouse-hovered, v = true)  ;; Line 7
$on-mouse-leave$: $ftd.set-bool($a = $foo.mouse-hovered, v = False)   ;; Line 8

-- end: foo   ;; Line 9

-- foo: xyz  ;; Line 10
$mouse-hovered: false   ;; Line 11


-- foo:   ;; Line 12
name: 123  ;; Line 13

questions.question: Which is/are the VALID list of `person` type
questions.code:
-- record person:
caption name:
optional body bio:

options.code:
-- person list people:

-- person: John
bio: I am John

-- person: Mary

I am Mary

-- end: people

-- person list people:

-- person: John
bio: I am John

-- person: Mary

I am Mary

-- list person people:

-- person: John
bio: I am John

-- person: Mary

I am Mary

-- end: people

-- person list people:

-- person: John
bio: I am John

-- person: Mary

I am Mary

-- end: person list people

questions.question: Which of the following option is correct?
questions.code:
-- ftd.row: 
color: black

-- ftd.text: abc

-- ftd.column: 
color: red

-- ftd.text: xyz
color: $inherited.colors

-- end: ftd.column

-- end: ftd.row

options.value: abc and xyz will have black color
abc and xyz will have black and red color respectively
abc and xyz will have red and black color respectively

questions.question: Which of the following has/have both light mode and dark mode values?
Which of the following is/are responsive type/s?
Which of the following is/are CORRECT to add `fastn-community.github.io/doc-site` as dependency in fastn?

options.code: -- fastn.package: fastn-community.github.io/doc-site as dependency
-- fastn.dependency: fastn-community.github.io/doc-site
-- fastn.dependency: fastn-community.github.io/doc-site as ds
-- fastn.package: fastn-community.github.io/doc-site

questions.question: Which line of code/s is/are WRONG?
questions.code:
--ftd.column:       ;; Line 1

-- ftd.text: Hello  ;; Line 2
-- ftd.text: World  ;; Line 3

-- end: column    ;; Line 4
